What I like

Being creative is not one of my strengths, for this reason I have always preferred to create the layout of websites, rather than creating contents or even creating code sometimes. But this is what life is about (at least for me), to get better day by day and face the things that are more difficult for us.

Let me tell you where my inspiration comes from: Anime!

Anime

Yes, I know, those animated drawings made by Japanese people. Anime might seem the classic cartoon a child would watch, and not what you would watch as an adult, because us adults are very mature and we only see series and movies with real actors.

But that's not my case.

Many of these anime series have been one of my biggest sources of inspiration and motivation. I have seen some situations of my daily life reflected in some of these Anime series more than once, so, more than a childish recreation, they have been some kind of example for me to keep going and continue to reach my goals.

My favorite animes

I will list a few of my favorite series and characters:

  • Naruto
  • My Hero Academia
  • Black Clover
  • Attack on Titan
Naruto from Naruto Shippuden Deku from My hero Academia Asta from Black Clover Mikasa from Attack on Titan

I invite you to give them a chance, maybe see the first chapter of each one...

Who knows? Maybe you could find inspiration in any of these too!
